sentence: More  than  190  soldiers  have  been  killed  and  more  than  1,170  have  been  wounded  since  troops  invaded  Gaza  in  late  October.
On  Oct.  7,  Hamas  attackers  invaded  southern  Israel,  killing  1,200  people  and  taking  more  than  200  hostages  into  Gaza,  Israeli  authorities  say.
One  was  killed  along  the  Israel-Gaza  border  on  Oct.  7  and  eight  others  were  wounded  during  the  ground  invasion  of  Gaza,  some  by  friendly  fire.
"His  team  killed  fighters  and  civilians  in  Gaza,  she  says.
